tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pharmaceutical_products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  competitor_id INT,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE pharmaceutical_products (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    market_research VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE pricing_strategy (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    competitor_id INT,
    strategy_description TEXT,
    pricing_tier INT
);

CREATE TABLE market_research_data (
    research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    research_date DATE,
    research_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES pharmaceutical_products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE competitor_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
    market_share DECIMAL,
    analysis_report TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES pharmaceutical_products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE pricing_strategy (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    base_price DECIMAL,
    discount_rate DECIMAL,
    profit_margin DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES pharmaceutical_products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE drug_products (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE market_research (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    findings TEXT,
    details JSON
)

CREATE TABLE competitor_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(100),
    products_sold INT,
    market_share DECIMAL(5, 2),
    strengths TEXT,
    weaknesses TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE pricing_strategy (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
    target_market VARCHAR(100),
    pricing_model VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE sales_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    quantity_sold INT
)
